properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 31 at 2:52PM PST until February 3 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...NW winds 15 to 25 kt with occasional gusts to 35 kt and
seas 12 to 17 ft.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino out 10 nm.

* WHEN...From 9 AM Saturday to noon Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM SATURDAY TO NOON MONDAY
